project.title: gamblers-uno
project.summary:
**Project Overview:**
A real-time multiplayer implementation of the classic UNO card game built for web browsers. This application enables players to create and join game rooms, play with friends remotely, and experience authentic UNO gameplay with all the traditional card mechanics and rules.

**Key Features:**
* Real-time multiplayer functionality with dynamic room management
* Complete UNO card game mechanics including special cards (Skip, Reverse, Wild, Draw Two)
* Interactive game room system with host privileges and player management
* Live in-game chat system for player communication
* Real-time turn tracking and "Call UNO!" functionality

**Technologies Used:**
Node.js, Socket.IO, Express.js, PostgreSQL, npm, HTML/CSS, JavaScript

**Impact & Benefits:**
This project brings the beloved UNO card game into the digital space, allowing friends and family to connect and play together regardless of physical location. It demonstrates sophisticated real-time web application capabilities while maintaining the engaging social aspects of traditional card games.

Note: This portfolio summary highlights the project's technical achievements while emphasizing its practical application and social gaming benefits. The implementation showcases both frontend and backend expertise, particularly in real-time web technologies and multiplayer game mechanics.
